finalizeTokenCross(address,address,addre.details: This function is executed on the destination chain

initTokensCross(address,address,address,.details: This function is executed on the origin chain

params._dstCrossToken: Address of the token that will arrive to the destination chain
params._dstDEX: Identifier of the exchange to use on the destination chain
params._dstToken: Address of the token the user wants to receive on destination
params._srcAmount: Amount of source tokens that user wants to move
params._srcCrossToken: Address of the token we will swap on origin chain to send to the bridge
params._srcDEX: Identifier of the exchange to use on the origin chain
params._srcToken: Address of the token the user wants to swidge
params._toChainId: Chain identifier that the user wants its token to receive
